name: Parasect
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.

attacks.name: Nutritional Support
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 {G} Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hibernation Spore
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. Flip 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, the Defending Pokémon is still Asleep.
